mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_district, recv_address, pay, order_time, status, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvDistrict}, #{recvAddress}, #{pay}, #{orderTime}, #{status}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )

INSERT INTO t_order_item ( oid, goods_id, goods_image, goods_title, goods_price, goods_count, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsCount}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
